definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: I'll try my best to rout out a good goalkeeper for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 我愿尽力为我们的足球队物色一位优秀的守门员。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.
sentences.chinese: 守门员用手掌勉强把球挡过球门横木。

sentences.english: Only the two back-up goalkeepers and central defender Raul Albiol did not get playing time.
sentences.chinese: 只有2个替补守门员和中卫阿尔比奥尔没上场。
守门员竟完全没机会挡球。

sentences.english: He replaced his brother as goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 他代替他哥哥当守门员。

sentences.english: The team's efforts to score were frustrated by the opposing goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 该队想要进球的努力被对方的守门员挫败了。

sentences.english: If you get the ball, throw it straight to the wicket-keeper.
sentences.chinese: 如果你得到球，直接扔给守门员。
我们少一个好的守门员。

sentences.english: I have been elected best goalkeeper by the South America Foot-ball Federation in succession three years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 我连续三年被南美足球联合会推举为最佳守门员。

sentences.english: In the end, I've gone for JERZY DUDEK as the goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我会选杜德克作为守门员。

sentences.english: Now they have to be reading the game and the goalkeeper is now the sweeper.
sentences.chinese: 现在他们必须阅读比赛，守门员现在就是清道夫。

sentences.english: Do NOT be afraid to make a pass back to your defenders or GK if options in front are limited.
sentences.chinese: 前方没有机会时，不要忌讳回传给后卫或守门员。
那是守门员应该说的话。

sentences.english: Goalies also have many new animations so their reactions are more realistic, particularly on second saves.
sentences.chinese: 守门员也有更多的动作，这样他们的反应更加真实。

definition: (soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia
ten-pin bowling/bowling ball/(baseball etc) ground ball
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
